snippet: The four missionaries, who were held for three days and questioned by Venezuelan authorities, were on their way home on Saturday.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Nicolas Maduro, in retaliation for sanctions imposed by Washington, orders sharp reduction in number of diplomats at American Embassy, and says Americans will now need visas to enter the country.
lead_paragraph: The four missionaries, who were held for three days and questioned by Venezuelan authorities, were on their way home on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Venezuela Aims to Limit U.S. Diplomats
